name: Scamp
description: A mischievous little devil who serves as Morissa's loyal, if somewhat incompetent, helper.

abilities.name: Sack of Blood
abilities.description: Offers a bloody sacrifice to heal an ally for 666 HP.

abilities.name: Succubus's Infernal Pact
abilities.description: Forms an infernal pact with an ally, doubling their combat stats for 3 turns. The little devil's greatest offering to his demonic mistress's allies.

abilities.name: Demonic Powder
abilities.description: Sprinkles mystical demonic powder on an ally, reducing ALL of their active ability cooldowns by 1 turn. The little devil's mischievous way of helping allies act faster.

passive.name: Sacrificial Devotion
passive.description: 65% chance to redirect damage and negative effects from allies to Scamp instead. Redirected damage is reduced to 35% of the original amount. Creates dramatic visual effects when triggered.
